item.title: Mountain Crest Acquisition Corp III S-1
item.description: Mountain Crest Acquisition Corp III, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC S-1 filing on April 27, 2021 had 44200 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 1141 instances combination - 872 instances shares - 588 instances may - 581 instances initial - 470 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
